I don't know where to find the original, but if openglad 
(http://snowstorm.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/site.cgi) doesn't work for 
you, I'm sure the devs would like to know about it so they can fix it.

Cody wrote:
> speaking of the files, anyone know where i can find them? I've looked
> everywhere for the full version download, i've found an openglad file
> but it doesnt work, i bought the game when i was a little kid so have
> password access to retail again (we lost the floppy..and manual) and i
> miss it now, anyone know where it is? and whatever happened too
> gladiator #2?
